website_summaries.verdict: A decent price for a mobile cooking set that has everything you need (just add a propane tank).
pros: This cooking set includes a 54,000 BTU flat-top burner with a 15-inch ring and a 50-quart aluminum pot with steaming basket and lid
Also comes with a 12-inch deep fryer thermometer
Good price for a complete cooking set
cons: The aluminum of this pot has a low melting point and should not be used with high heat
Steamer is a little on the small side
Some reports of this set arriving damaged or missing parts

customer_reviews.title: Great pot for Maryland Crabs
customer_reviews.text: Great crab steaming pot. I live in Maryland and we occasionally do crab feasts. This pot is perfect for a big crab cookout. Last week I cooked 2 bushels of Maryland blue crabs in 5 batches using this pot, could have done it in 4 batches if I wanted to. So the basket holds 1/2 bushel of crabs! Worked great, very heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Works great for steaming crabs
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to steam Maryland blue crabs. We put about 3 dozen in at a time and steam them for about 15 minutes(after liquid comes to boil) or until they turn red/orange. Works beautifully! Would highly recommend. It could be used for any cooking/steaming like shrimp boil, corn on the cob, clams,...Very good quality pot and steamer!
customer_reviews.author: LoverOfTheLight

customer_reviews.title: Good for a small boil
customer_reviews.text: I recently boiled 35lbs of crawfish in this pot in two batches. My only real complaint is that the basket is not deep enough. It's really designed for steaming and the basket sits up several inches below the bottom of the pot so its more like a 42qt boiling pot with basket. I got a good price from warehouse deals so I'm fine with the capacity. I didn't assemble the stand or burner because I already have one so I will save this for when mine finally rusts out.
customer_reviews.author: zd

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: We do a huge low country boil and crab feast every summer and got tired of borrowing other people's pots and burners. Looked online and a lot of pots and burners were just too expensive. This was the cheapest we found and I was a bit leery, but it does everything I need it to go and more. The pot held up great, it was easy to put together and use. I even used it on and off all summer to can so my kitchen wouldn't get too hot! It is a great buy and I highly recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Necol Short

customer_reviews.title: Crab boil for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Husband and I wanted to have our first crab boil put checking prices everywhere for everything we needed had us discouraged. When we found the whole set on amazon for such a great price I thought for sure it would be horrible quality but we decided to take our chances and I'm glad we did. This is perfect. Perfect for a crab broil, great pot, great stand, great price. We couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Boils Water Quickly - Excellent for occasional use
customer_reviews.text: This cooker has been great so far, definitely can't be beat for the price we paid on Amazon. We boil water in our cooker to scald turkeys and chickens before plucking and it does the job quick and well. There were a few very small dents in the bottom of the pot when it arrived but it did not affect the functionality. Also, after a few uses I can see the base/stand paint is peeling off a little but nothing that can't be fixed up with some high heat spray paint. I definitely recommend this to the occasional user since I could see how it may wear out quickly if used on a regular basis, but the price reflects that.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Missing An Important Part
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product last year and never used it until the opportunity came along last week when my family came over. Well GUESS WHAT, I could not use it because it missing a very important part...the flat bar casting support bracket!!!! The worse part is I know King Kooker would just replace it had I bought it directly from them but noooo, I had to go with a different seller because it was cheaper...guess that wasn't a good idea...other than that it would have been awesome...heck I would change my review if someone would call me back to help me get the missing part!!!
customer_reviews.author: Latte'

customer_reviews.title: Nice pot
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend who my husband and I often get Alaskan king crab legs with him and his wife to eat, and he cooks them. He used to use one or two way smaller pots and the legs would be cooked in many batch rounds. With this pot we can cook them all at once and just dig in. This pot was bigger than I thought it would be, it’s also pretty sturdy and set up was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B.

customer_reviews.title: This product is wonderful! We have a house on the Chesapeake Bay ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful! We have a house on the Chesapeake Bay and frequently catch crabs. We can fit about 3 1/2 dozen in the pot at one time and they steam perfectly. We use it on the patio and it saves the house from smelling like a seafood restaurant for the rest of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Scarby Fam

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for Seafood Bakes - QUICK and EASY!
customer_reviews.text: This was EXACTLY what I thought it would be and what I needed. I was able to quickly and easily put it all together and get it hooked up. I steamed a half bushel of jumbo Maryland Blue Crabs with no problem at all. I want to get crabs every weekend JUST to use this thing it is THAT easy!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Superb for my Low Country Boil
customer_reviews.text: I have had commercially prepared Low country boils all over the south. I wanted a boil for my Birthday so I gifted myself with this cooker. It arrived on time. Everything was fine except the lid was bent enough that it would not seal on the pot. I called the manufacturer and they quickly mailed me a replacement in plenty of time for my party. Everything worked perfectly and I even received a lot of accolades about my boil. Great Cooker and sweet price.
customer_reviews.author: Rog47a

customer_reviews.title: Just shut up and buy it already
customer_reviews.text: I got this so that I could boil crawfish. I've used it many many times now I'm looking to get some Lobster. I'd say the only drawback is that the instructions are generic for a few different types of models and it doesn't really tell you which model you have back just to look at the pictures and it's pretty easy assembly
customer_reviews.author: Nanthawat

customer_reviews.title: love it.  Great for shrimp boil.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this cooker for a shrimp boil and it worked great. We were able to feed 10 people with 1 batch. Be sure you have a really flat place to set it up when you're ready to cook. We thought we had a flat place, but it was slightly slanted and that gave us a bit of a problem due to how the legs are configured.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie C

customer_reviews.title: Good for brewing!
customer_reviews.text: The value of this is dynamite. Yeah it is not the same quality as a stainless pot but if you are nice to it you won’t have any problems. I use it for brewing beer and can bring 6 gallons of wort up to boil pretty quickly. Propane burner/stand is sturdy enough to support the weight.
customer_reviews.author: FEATHERS44

customer_reviews.title: It was more sturdy than i expected based on some other reviews
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a recent crawfish boil. I was boiling 15 lbs along with potatoes and corn and such and it still wasn't quite big enough. It got the job done though. It was more sturdy than i expected based on some other reviews. The base rusts very easily. After just one use it had already began to rust. all in all not bad for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Ressler

customer_reviews.title: Burner was very nice and worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time but the pot was dented in a few places. The party was the next day so I had to use it or I would of sent it back. Thermometer does not work either and was very cheap looking. Burner was very nice and worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Works great for portable cooking while camping
customer_reviews.text: Works great for portable cooking while camping. The clams and steamed seafood taste great. Also got a 14 quart kettle with strainer and use it for deep frying French fries and waffle cakes. Best investment for camping only problem is now everyone comes to our campsite for dinner!!
customer_reviews.author: jesse

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a shrimp boil for us
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a shrimp boil for us. Had a group of 20 (9 adults, 7 aged six to sixteen, 4 toddlers). Using the strainer cuts the space some but very handy for a boil (strainer sits inside, so it cuts your radius by 1/2 inch or so, and it sits a few inches above the bottom of the pot so it can be used for steaming). Could probably get more capacity if I were to boil potatoes and corn, then dump those and then cook the precooked smoked sausage and raw shrimp after. Paint burns off of the burner ring - but I am not concerned. Might spray paint it with high heat paint sometime down the line.
customer_reviews.author: A. HAMMELL

customer_reviews.title: Bought to use as a dungeness crab cooker.  Works well for that purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use as a dungeness crab cooker. Works well for that purpose. Not the most robust construction and the instructions were a little sketchy/sparse. Easy to light and control. Heats up quickly too.
customer_reviews.author: govy1

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner brew kettle!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to upgrade my brew kettle so I can make bigger 5 gallon batches. Works great boils water in no time. Great deal would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Kamfree

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I had a friend assemble it while I prepared the food, but I didn't hear too many complaints. I used it for a seafood boil and it was very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it works like it says!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Was not expecting this for the money I paid. Steamed six 2 lb. live lobsters in this thing with room to spare. I put about 3" of water in the pot and it was boiling like crazy in about 6 minutes. When the lobster were in, I had to keep turning the flame down as it was almost boiling over. This pot and burner create a LOT of heat so keep an eye on it and save the propane. Assembly took about 20 minutes and it was no big deal. Can't wait to do a crawfish boil!
customer_reviews.author: nusparkey

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one. We first bough one for the beach and worked so well we bough a second one
customer_reviews.author: David Geer

customer_reviews.title: cooker
customer_reviews.text: Great cooker, it came with a lot and holds a lot. We've done several seafood and low country boils in it.
customer_reviews.author: Ambassador B

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts!
customer_reviews.text: This product was missing parts. One of the legs was missing. My husband made it work though. We needed it for the beach to cook a low country boil and it did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Mel D.

customer_reviews.title: It was pretty terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty terrible quality. We set it up and it began to tilt so much that it was at a 30 degree angle while cooking. Once we heated up the water, white flakes started developing all over the impacted sides.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine Tripsa

customer_reviews.title: We now have 1 of these at each of our houses.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, easy to use. We love this pot for steaming oysters in SC and also steaming lobsters in MA.
customer_reviews.author: Christine B.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks decent quality for the money. However I recieved damaged product. Update:6-20-18 I didn’t seem to have any issues with the pot getting hot spots or burning. All the paint did burn off the stand but that’s to be expected even on the expensive ones..
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle & Dustin Ellsworth

customer_reviews.title: Cheap POS!
customer_reviews.text: Not cheap but it’s a piece of crap! Such a waste of money! We literally just used it for no more than 30 minutes and I started smelling burning metal (the photo attached explains it all).
customer_reviews.author: J. Tam

customer_reviews.title: this was a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Had to put it together with help as the directions were not self explanatory and in a different language. Luckily, someone in our party had done this before and after a half hour, had this baby cooking up a storm. Other than no instructions, this was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie L. Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Although assembly is required and very easy, the hardware provided is very cheap. The bolt that attaches the Venturi tube broke with little effort. The pot and the lid we're both dented. There is some odd adhesive all over the lid. Not happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Morawski

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: This product was missing 3 parts when I received it and the manual was only in Spanish. I will be returning it and purchasing from elsewhere. Highly disappointed because this was a fathers day gift and we had live crabs for him to steam and it couldn't even be put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but ended up getting an 80qt pot for a crawfish boil party.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check for defects before discarding your box
customer_reviews.text: Honestly i got this one day before the big day and it came defected. Wasted a lot of time and energy fixing it cus i did not have the time to get it returned. It was a mess we did end up spending another 30 bucks at the hardware store fixing the defect to be able to use it. But not worth the head ache. I read a few reviews and apparently its a common thing with these guys
customer_reviews.author: Ramiro EL. Tercero

customer_reviews.title: Used as a turkey fryer, but NEED to purchase a fry rack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for frying turkeys. Just make sure you also purchase a turkey fry set like the Bayou Classic 0835 Complete Poultry Frying Rack Set. I think if you tried to fry a turkey using the steamer basket you could potentially lose a lot of oil when pulling the turkey out and you might burn yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy T.

customer_reviews.title: and the frame wasn't entirely sturdy. It had a little shake
customer_reviews.text: It was a little bit of a pain to put together, and the frame wasn't entirely sturdy. It had a little shake, but once the weight of the pot with water was put on it subsided a little bit. Works great however, just a little wobble took a star away. It's a massive cooker and easily cooked 10lbs of large crawfish at once
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCust

customer_reviews.title: Great for seafood and next a turkey!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves to cook with this. We take it to the beach to steam seafood and are even contemplating frying a turkey in it one day. It holds enough to feed 15+people.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Not Expensive and does a Fine Job
customer_reviews.text: Simple to assemble. Does a great job bringing and seasonings to a boil and maintains the boil once ingredients are added. I store it covered alongside my outdoor kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Yurecka

customer_reviews.title: Really good value!
customer_reviews.text: I use the cooker and pot to steam Dungeness Crab. I've found steaming to be far superior to boiling, and this combination does a great job. The cooker itself is not as sturdy as some on the market, but it is definitely adequate. It's simply the best deal going for a crab cooker!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assembly. Boiler - basket fit is perfect. Flame adjustable. Boiled shrimp the first day used - the shrimp was great! Haven't tried oysters yet, oyster knifes will be here tomorrow. A friend of mine made one at twice the cost.
customer_reviews.author: C. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Pot is great; Stand could be better
customer_reviews.text: Low country boils require a kit like this. Pot and basket are perfect. Stand works but could be a bit more heavy duty. I recommend adding lactate to nuts to avoid them backing off. Pot 5 stars, stand 4.
customer_reviews.author: GF Bouchard

customer_reviews.title: It held plenty of food for everyone to enjoy!
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly for our shrimp boil! It held plenty of food for everyone to enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect for our lobster boil cookout, will use it all summer long.
customer_reviews.author: sariego

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this steamer! We have used it multiple times and it has done an outstanding job! We use it for seafood and corn and it cooks our food quickly! We got 4 dozen jumbo blue crabs in it with a half dozen ears of corn and 2lbs of shrimp and still had room to spare! Its easy to clean and stores nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very large pot. Sturdy construction. Would definitely recommend. Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful BIG cooker. East to assemble. More than enough BTU's to get the boil going. I really love the strainer basket. We can pull out the goodies of our shrimp boil and dump then reload the basket and start the next batch will absolute ease.
customer_reviews.author: Zeek

customer_reviews.title: Forgot the nuts and bolts
customer_reviews.text: The product came without nuts and bolts so it was annoying to have to go out and purchase them other than that it worked perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine

customer_reviews.title: Great for our seafood boils!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pot! It works great for our boils where we feed 12-15 people. So much easier than using the stove in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, very durable!
customer_reviews.text: This pot and steamer system is the bees knees. The pot itself is very sturdy and durable. The steamer basket fits perfectly inside and it is extremely easy to use. We use this pot to steam crab legs and it does not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: S. Landers

customer_reviews.title: The pot stains easily. Overall decent quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: The assembly instructions leave a lot to be wanting. Stand is kind of shaky. The pot stains easily. Overall decent quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: RedShoes1981

customer_reviews.title: Great for homebrewing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for homebrewing. The steam basket is perfect for brew in a bag. The only negative I have is this: If you are not the type of person who can assemble by pictures, you are going to struggle with assembly. If you are the type, pretty straightforward bolt-together design. Would definitely recommend for homebrewers.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Got it for my husband to do low country boils in and it is perfect. Never tried to cook anything different than that.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Very very satisfied with my new burner
customer_reviews.text: Very very satisfied with my new burner. It is of great quality and is very useful in my family
customer_reviews.author: Violet Dugas

customer_reviews.title: Good for A summer!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but I agree with the other posts. Quality is not the best and probably won't hold up for many crab feasts! I'd be nervous to put a full pot of water on top of the burner... i don't think its strong enough!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Great price for the whole package
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. Much better price than anything we could find locally. Cooked coastal crabs in it right after we got it. Fits about 5-8 crabs really well without it bubbling over and putting out the flame.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Just assembled and tested it the burner works well. ...
customer_reviews.text: Just assembled and tested it the burner works well... The only issue I had was the instruction booklet was hard to understand ..
customer_reviews.author: Noel scalone

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Works great it’s easy to assemble if you have the tools to assemble it But once it’s assembled it’s perfect
customer_reviews.author: Lo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, has everything needed except for the stirring paddles, but great price cheaper than the stores. thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: v mazo

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Received the product all bent up missing the cast burner and thermometer. Won’t ever buy this brand again
customer_reviews.author: Burton

customer_reviews.title: Okay...
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time and overall looks decent. Other than when I opened the box the pot was dented, the lid handle was smashed, and the thermometer was broken...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised and am very pleased with the quality of the product
customer_reviews.text: As advertised and am very pleased with the quality of the product. The wind shroud would benefit from being a bit deeper.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Best lobsta and steamers ever
customer_reviews.text: Best lobsta and steamers ever. Nice and big. Best part is no smelly kitchen afterward...love being able to cook everything outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: donna wholley

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Worked just fine, but did not come with enough screws and washers. Was missing 3 screws with washers.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Great size and pot for the occasional crawfish boil
customer_reviews.text: Great size and pot for the occasional crawfish boil. I can fit about 15 lbs of crawfish with potatoes and the fixings. It took a while to put together the stand, though, but once it's together, it's all good
customer_reviews.author: William S. Feuerstein

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this due to good reviews and we are very happy with it. Easy assemble. Pot cleans easily. Our 1st fish boil turned out fantastic! Saved the broth and made a delicious chowder with the left overs. Bought another one for our second home!
customer_reviews.author: LAURA

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good cooker. Purchased because I wanted to do my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good cooker. Purchased because I wanted to do my first crab boil and I was very impressed with the results I am glad that I made the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Calvin C.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does the best job for cooking crabs. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but cam with better big dent in lid and ...
customer_reviews.text: Got my king cooker yesterday. Looks nice but came with big dent in lid and missing the hooks. Wish I could return but I have a boil party today and no time.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Excellent setup for anyone wanting to get into all grain ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent setup for anyone wanting to get into all grain home brewing. I actually use this for doing both brew in a bag and mashtun batches. I modified the burners by gluing two washers on the air intake to cover up some of the airflow (like a choke.) This gives more control over the heat output of the burner.
customer_reviews.author: M. Arnett

customer_reviews.title: Never did reach a rolling boil but good enough to cook crab
customer_reviews.text: Used a whole canister of propane to get this boiling with the lid on. Never did reach a rolling boil but good enough to cook crab.
customer_reviews.author: gg37

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Seafood boils....
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this set. No more turkey fryers for my seafood boils. Sturdy pot and nice stand. Only downside was that the instructions to assemble the stand weren't very clear.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie Mc

customer_reviews.title: ... low country boil twice with it and it was perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Had a low country boil twice with it and it was perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: Can’t come up with a bad thing to say here. It was exactly what I ordered. Large enough for a crawfish boil for 30.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Never steamed before, this product made it easy!
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of having to wait for summer carnivals where they over charge you for dirty clams, and decided to try and see if I could steam some myself. I am not a 'Man's Man' who kills bears with his hands, but even I found that this product was easy to assemble and easy to operate. For my last BBQ, I put a whole bushel of clams (400) through the steamer and apparently I am the new go to guy in regards to steaming clams in my neighborhood. All in all, this product was a very good purchase and I would make it again in a heartbeat. Very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cooker. Heats quickly and a very largrc pot
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cooker. Heats quickly and a very largrc pot. It took two pots to boil 20 pounds of shrimp. You could maybe do more.
customer_reviews.author: Badbullgator

customer_reviews.title: huge pot!
customer_reviews.text: Works well and did what I needed it to do. Burner lights up nice and even. The pot is huge, so I had to buy another smaller pot, as I rarely need one this size for anything.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon Shaw

customer_reviews.title: shipping problems
customer_reviews.text: the pot had dents in it it was usable but I was disappointed in it...Sorry
customer_reviews.author: Peter M. Knodel

customer_reviews.title: amazing cooker, heats up very quickly (when filled to ...
customer_reviews.text: amazing cooker, heats up very quickly (when filled to steam level -- i haven't tried a full pot boil). easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Mike

customer_reviews.title: I was nervous about butting this set since it was ...
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about butting this set since it was going to be my first one. Used it to through a graduation party with crawfish and it worked perfectly! No complainants.
customer_reviews.author: Monie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal! I am absolutely positively bowled over by what I got for the money. Quality is great. Delivery as promised. Just can get any better than this.
customer_reviews.author: dajigamup

customer_reviews.title: Frickin" Rocks!!!
customer_reviews.text: DUDE!!! This sucker cranked out the best crab pot dinner ever!!! 18 people fed with no heat slow down. I actually sold one of these sets to my neighbor who attended our meal!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little larger than I needed, but works really great
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan H.

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately the dented pot did not interfere with the basket ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised but was damaged in shipping. Fortunately the dented pot did not interfere with the basket so I kept it instead of returning it...Nice quality just wish the stand was a little more stable but worked fine on a pad I made with concrete patio slabs. We had a clam steam and the burner had plenty of BTUs. Overall very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Works great!!! Boiled blue crabs and shrimp. Fixing to do 30Lbs of crawfish and some shrimp this weekend
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Really a great value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for boiling malt extract, hops, and water for beer preparation. The propane stove is a perfect companion product for easy outdoor cooking. Wish I'd purchased the set years ago .
customer_reviews.author: luckyace120

customer_reviews.title: Slit in the pot
customer_reviews.text: the pot has a large slit in it so it will not hold any water, so it is worthless.. my husband just opened it for his birthday on Aug. 8 and we could not do our crab boil... how do i return this?
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: served its purpose. have only used once for one pot of crawfish.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa McCuller

customer_reviews.title: 3th time using it now
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Used it for 3 times now to boil crawfish. No problems. Everybody loves it
customer_reviews.author: Darius Darthard

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for Fish boils. Safe and easy to work with and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy G. Burnside

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality Set!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to replace a burner that had rusted out after many years of use. Perfect for steaming clams and lobsters. I'm looking forward to deep frying the Thanksgiving turkey this year.
customer_reviews.author: Craig M.

customer_reviews.title: missing assembly pieces,
customer_reviews.text: missing assembly pieces, it only had one of the 13 bolts required but I used that one to go buy the parts needed and it works perfect
customer_reviews.author: laloni baca

customer_reviews.title: Cooked six lobsters in this easily could of fit more and it worked great
customer_reviews.text: Cooked six lobsters in this easily could of fit more and it worked great! Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Bayside Beaches

customer_reviews.title: Deteriorating after one use
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the burner/stand started flaking paint everywhere and smelled so bad we could barely stand near it when cooking! Poor quality!
customer_reviews.author: kroth

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price....
customer_reviews.text: I've been very happy so far. The base maintains a good flame, even with windy coastal conditions. You must be careful with the pot and lid. It is easily dented. Not a big issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrett

customer_reviews.title: We also used the stainless steel container to hold a ...
customer_reviews.text: We also used the stainless steel container to hold a lot of ice, beer and and soda for a recent birthday party. Looking forward to hosting a Cajun seafood feast in the near future!
customer_reviews.author: May Sganga

customer_reviews.title: Don’t leave stand out overnight.
customer_reviews.text: The paint chipped off stand and began to rust 1st use. Stand is a touch wobbly but all in all good product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Bekah

customer_reviews.title: Great for Shrimp Boil
customer_reviews.text: Used it this past weekend on a group campout. Made a great shrimp boil with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Gatorman

customer_reviews.title: Steamer/boiler it is; fryer it's not
customer_reviews.text: My rating is based upon what it is...a steamer/boiling pot. It is NOT a fryer, nor does it claim to be. If you are looking for a combination unit (one that fries turkeys as well) this is not the unit for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for it's price. Assembly was easy and we had a wonderful night if Maryland steamed blue crabs.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Boughter

customer_reviews.title: Purchased a returned item
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a returned one and it met my expectations. Only one part was damaged but not needed to operate. It works great!😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: King Kooker 5012 Portable Propane Outdoor Boiling and Steaming Cooker Package with 50-Quart Aluminum Pot and Steaming Basket
product_meta.description: Boil and Steam Seafood and Veggies. Great for all Types of Cooking. Bolt Together 12-Inch Flat Top Outdoor Cooker, 15-Inch Diameter Top Ring, 50-Quart Aluminum Ridge Pot with Steamer Basket and Lid, Listed LP Hose and Regulator with Type 1 Connection Deep Fry Thermometer, Instruction/Recipe Booklet. CSA Design Certified. Box Dimensions: 16.5 x 16.5 x 15 inches. Shipping Weight: 28-pounds.
feature_bullets: THIS PRODUCT IS NOT FOR FRYING TURKEYS.
Bolt Together 12-Inch 54,000 BTU Flat Top Outdoor Cooker
50-quart aluminum ridge pot with steamer basket and lid
Listed LP hose and regulator with Type 1 connection
